info.name: Confluent Cloud APIs
info.description:
This is a Confluent Cloud API collection for the extension `Thunder Client` for Visual Studio Code.
It is based on the OpenAPI specification released by Confluent, see https://docs.confluent.io/cloud/current.

CAUTION: Everything contained in this repository is not supported by Confluent.

DISCLAIMER AND WARNING: You use this code at your own risk! Please do not use it for production systems. The author may not be held responsible for any harm caused by this code!

How to use:
Create an environment and add it to this collection, providing the following variables:

CONFLUENT_CLOUD_BASE_URL=https://api.confluent.cloud

CONFLUENT_CLOUD_API_KEY=<The API key for accessing confluent cloud>

CONFLUENT_CLOUD_API_SECRET=<The API secret for accessing confluent cloud>


CONFLUENT_CLOUD_CLUSTER_API_ENDPOINT=<The REST endpoint of a cluster>

CONFLUENT_CLOUD_CLUSTER_API_KEY=<The API key for accessing the cluster (NOT THE CLOUD API KEY)>

CONFLUENT_CLOUD_CLUSTER_API_SECRET=<The API secret for accessing the cluster (NOT THE CLOUD API SECRET)>


CONFLUENT_CLOUD_STREAM_GOVERNANCE_API_ENDPOINT=<The REST endpoint of your stream governance entity>

CONFLUENT_CLOUD_STREAM_GOVERNANCE_API_KEY=<The API key for accessing stream governance (NOT THE CLOUD API KEY)>

CONFLUENT_CLOUD_STREAM_GOVERNANCE_API_SECRET=<The API secret for accessing stream governance  (NOT THE CLOUD API SECRET)>

CONFLUENT_CLOUD_METRICS_API_ENDPOINT=https://api.telemetry.confluent.cloud

body.raw:
{
  "api_version": "iam/v2",
  "kind": "IdentityPool",
  "id": "dlz-f3a90de",
  "display_name": "My Identity Pool",
  "description": "Prod Access to Kafka clusters to Release Engineering",
  "identity_claim": "claims.sub",
  "filter": "claims.aud==\"confluent\" && claims.group!=\"invalid_group\"",
  "principal": "pool-abc",
  "state": "ENABLED"
}

Reset the given config to default value
Signup an Organization on behalf of a Customer
Signup a Customer by Linking to an Existing Organization
Test schema compatibility against a particular schema subject-version
Test schema compatibility against all schemas under a subject
Gets schema exporter status by name.
Gets schema exporter config by name.

List subjects associated to schema ID

Read Business Metadata for an Entity
Delete a Business Metadata for an Entity
Delete a Tag for an Entity

body.raw:
{
  "api_version": "cdx/v1",
  "kind": "ProviderSharedResource",
  "id": "dlz-f3a90de",
  "resources": [
    "crn://confluent.cloud/environment=env-123/cloud-cluster=lkc-111aaa/kafka=lkc-111aaa/topic=my.topic"
  ],
  "display_name": "Stock Trades",
  "organization_description": "ABC Corp is the biggest online retailer",
  "organization_contact": "jane.doe@example.com",
  "logo_url": "https://confluent.cloud/api/cdx/v1/provider-shared-resources/sr-123/images/logo"
}
